ygData.subject: RE: NPC's Binding
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Have you been far in?  It is a *huge* dungeon.  Most of the mobs that give special items in GuK are high teens to mid 20s, with a few up into the 30s.  My
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 14 Jul 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:

> Actually Guk is worse. I'm only 15th and 95% of the
> things I encountered in there were so green they ignored

Have you been far in? It is a *huge* dungeon. Most of the
mobs that give special items in GuK are high teens to mid 20s,
with a few up into the 30s. My friends and I got decimated in
there when we first tried it at L17-19. A couple nights ago,
my L21-26 group of six had a moderately easy time getting to
the froglok lord room, but had to turn around there because of
the multiple yellow/red frogs (to me at 26) that were inside.
The frogloks at the entrance have mostly trash loot (though I
suppose woven armor might not be considered trash).

In Paw, the special items come from low to mid teen mobs, and
the dungeon is not very close to any of the newbie city zones.

> me. I'd say 7th would be good for the outer rooms, but
> what 7th level character is likely to be running thru
> Oasis and S Ro?

Um, trolls maybe? :-)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
